Template.Name: The name of the template
Template.MasterTemplateAlias: The alias of the templates master template

ContentType.Name: The name of the content type
ContentType.Alias: The alias of the content type
ContentType.Description: A full description of the content type
ContentType.AllowedContentTypes: A comma separated list of allowable child content type
ContentType.AllowedTemplates: A comma separated list of allowable templates
ContentType.ContentTypeComposition: A comma separated list of the ContentType aliases that compose the content type

Property.Name: The property name
Property.Description: A full description of the property
Property.Group: The name of the group the property belongs to

Script.Name: The script name including file type extesion

PartialView.Path: The partial view path e.g xxx/yyy.cshtml

Macro.Name: The macro name
Macro.ScriptPath: The path to the scripting file e.g ~/Views/MacroPartials/xxx/yyy.cshtml
Macro.XsltPath: The path to the xslt file e.g ~/Xslt/xxx/yyy.xslt
Macro.ControlType: The path to the user control or ControlType
